description: Bizarre and beautiful capture the essence of Bryce Canyon.  The Queen's Garden and Navajo Loop is one of a few options that will take you around the fabulous hoodoos.  More of a walk 'n' gawk than a hike.  The long grade out is the only real element of difficulty.We took in a sunset and sunrise at Inspiration Point -- well worth the effort.
directions: Park at Sunset Point - 37°37'25.4"N 112°10'03.0"W.  The Rim Trail connects to various trails.
title: Queen's Garden & Navajo Loop
